The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Lvl-4 EnchantThe RuneScape Classic Wiki also has an article on: classicrsw:Enchant lvl-4 amulet
This article is about the spell. For the magic tablet, see Enchant diamond.
Lvl-4 Enchant
Released 24 May 2001 (Update)
Members No
Level 57
Spellbook Standard
Type Utility
Experience 67
Runes 10 1
Casting speed 3 ticks (7 on autocast)
Lectern Teak demon
Description For use on diamond jewellery
Animation
Sound Effect

Lvl-4 Enchant is a utility spell in the standard spellbook, requiring level 57 Magic to cast. The spell enchants diamond jewellery, granting 67 Magic experience when doing so (50.2 if cast in the Mage Training Arena).

This spell can be transferred to a magic tablet by bringing the required runes and a piece of soft clay to a lectern in the study of a player-owned house, granting the same experience as casting the spell.

Like other jewellery enchantment spells, Lvl-4 Enchant will automatically re-cast every 7 ticks (4.2 seconds). While less click-intensive, it is much slower than enchanting each piece of jewellery individually. An inventory of 27 pieces of jewellery would take about one minute and fifty seconds to enchant at this rate.

When cast actively, a player could theoretically achieve 2,000 casts per hour for a total of 134,000 xp. When cast passively only 857 casts can be achieved, worth 57,419 xp. In practice, both of these numbers will be slightly lower due to time spent banking.

List of items[edit | edit source]

Free-to-play players can only use the spell to enchant the diamond amulet.

Unenchanted Enchanted Profit[e 1]
Item GE price Item GE price
Diamond ring 1,917 Ring of life 1,866 −165
Diamond necklace 1,998 Phoenix necklace 2,213 101
Diamond bracelet 2,003 Abyssal bracelet 2,208 91
Diamond amulet 2,027 Amulet of power 2,092 −49
  1. ^ Includes spell costs; column assumes an appropriate rune-providing item is used.
